seller_description: Product Description: Propel Immune Support Variety Pack: Lemon Blackberry, Orange Raspberry, Pineapple Peach. Product details: Package Dimensions : 10.93 x 8.46 x 7.87 inches; 1 Pounds. UPC : 052000050646. Manufacturer : PepsiCO. ASIN : B09NMQ323Y. Country of Origin : USA
review: This package of 2-24 packs of Grape Propel was delivered and one bottle from one package was broken and leaked all over the box and package. This was not a pleasant experience since I have ordered several in the past and never had this problem.
expected-output: Seller Description: The seller describes a Propel Immune Support variety pack with zero calories, zero sugar, Gatorade electrolytes, and a selection of flavors. The product is marketed as a refreshing, hydrating beverage with added vitamins. The description emphasizes the quality of packaging and contents. Buyer Review: The buyer received two 24-packs of Grape Propel, with one bottle in one package broken and leaking, which led to a mess within the package. The buyer noted this as a negative experience, highlighting that previous orders did not have this issue. Image Comparison: Seller Image: Shows a well-packaged 12-pack of Propel with a clean, organized presentation. Buyer Image: Displays a damaged box with visible leaks and wear, supporting the buyer's claim of a broken bottle leaking throughout the package. Discrepancies and Satisfaction Alignment: The product details in terms of flavor, brand, and description are consistent with the seller's claims, meeting the expectations set by the seller description. Dissatisfaction: The buyer is dissatisfied due to the damage and leakage, which disrupted the usual quality and convenience of the order. This issue seems related to handling during shipping or packaging robustness, rather than the product quality itself. Conclusion: The buyer's dissatisfaction stems from a damaged package during transit, which impacted their experience. The issue appears to be with the shipping or packaging rather than a fault of the product itself" In this situation, the buyer's dissatisfaction is valid, as the experience was affected by a damaged package during transit. The fault lies with either the shipping process or packaging robustness, which did not protect the product adequately. The issue is not due to the product quality itself, as the contents and description otherwise met the expectations set by the seller.
label: 0:Here seller is at fault
